name: Heatblast
description: Heatblast is a plasma-based life-form whose body is composed of a super hot inner plasma body covered by dark reddish brown volcanic rocks. As a fire-based entity, his body radiates high amounts of heat.

name: Wildmutt
description: Wildmutt is a large orange dog-like creature with no eyes, ears, nose, or tail. The various spines found all across his body function similarly to whiskers with tactile sensing. He uses his sense of smell and hearing to navigate.

name: Diamondhead
description: Being a silicon-based life  form, Diamondhead's body is composed entirely of green/blue crystals, which are of a very hard durable, diamond-like substance. He sports four crystal shards on his back and has a sharp head.

name: XLR8
description: XLR8 resembles a semi-armored Velociraptor. He has black orbs on his feet that help him reach running speeds of 500 miles per hour.

name: Grey Matter
description: Grey Matter is a grey-skinned, frog-like, bipedal alien that is only six inches tall with large green eyes. His small size belies his great calculative and technical intellect.

name: Four Arms
description: Four Arms is a humanoid alien that is ten feet tall. He has well-developed muscles, two pairs of four-fingered arms, and red skin. While he lacks ears and a nose, his four eyes make up for it.

name: Stinkfly
description: Stinkfly possesses two dragon-shaped insectoid wings that allow quick and agile flying and can change directions at exceptional paces. He has four small eyes on long prehensile stalks connected to his large head, which can all be moved around independently from each other.

name: Ripjaws
description: Ripjaws shares a number of traits with Earth's aquatic life, including those of an alligator, an eel, a leech, an anglerfish, and a shark. He can change between a fishtail or legs at will and has a phosphorescent light on his head.

name: Upgrade
description: Upgrade is an amorphous alien whose body is made up of billions of small cell-like creatures called nanites allowing him to reshape and possess any technology.

name: Ghostfreak
description: Ghostfreak is a phantom/ghost-like alien with a gaseous appearance and claw-like hands. He possesses removable skin, revealing tentacles underneath, and can render himself invisible when necessary.

name: Cannonbolt
description: Cannonbolt is a hulking, broad-shouldered alien covered in natural, yellow armor plating on his back. When rolled up, he becomes a motorized wheel that can move at great speeds.

name: Wildvine
description: Wildvine is a humanoid plant with one eye in the middle of his face, vine-like legs, and pods on his back that he can use as explosives or smoke bombs.

name: Spitter
description: Spitter is a bulbous alien resembling a pufferfish with legs. He can inflate into a ball-like shape and spit out a concentrated blast of very slippery slime

name: Buzzshock
description: Buzzshock's appearance is similar to an Earth dry cell battery, albeit rounded out. He has positive (+) and negative (-) symbols on his back, symbolizing his ability to manipulate electricity.

name: Arctiguana
description: As his name suggests, Arctiguana's appearance somewhat resembles an iguana. He is a cold-blooded alien, like normal reptiles, whose blood is literally very cold.

name: Blitzwolfer
description: Blitzwolfer has grey fur and a long flowing mane. By opening his quad-hinged muzzle, he can emit a powerful, green, ultrasonic howl.

name: Snare-oh
description: Snare-oh is a mummy-like alien whose bandages are made from an alien material that feels like old cloth, but do have elasticity which allows him to reshape his body at will.

name: Frankenstrike
description: Frankenstrike is a seven-foot-tall monster/cyborg humanoid. He has two large tower-shaped, conductor coil-like generators located on his upper back that allow him to generate and manipulate lightning and electromagnetism.

name: Upchuck
description: Upchuck is a vaguely humanoid amoeba-like creature with green skin. He has multiple adhesive tongues that can stretch to great lengths, allowing him to latch onto large objects and reel them in for consumption.

name: Ditto
description: Ditto is about the height of an average human child. He has gem-like extended sensory nodes on his arms and waist, and the ability to clone himself without limits through binary fission.

name: Eye Guy
description: Eye Guy has a muscular build with an entire upper-body covered in green eyes, around 20 of them, allowing him to see in all directions at once. His entire skeleton is made of cartilage, not bones.

name: Way Big
description: Way Big is a white colossal humanoid creature with a large fin on his head. He can can shoot powerful cosmic rays by crossing his arms together and grow to immense size

name: Swampfire
description: Swampfire is a humanoid, plant-like alien that is taller than an average human and has a distinct rotten stench that worsens with heat.

name: Echo Echo
description: Echo Echo is a small, white humanoid made of silicon. Although he strongly resembles a robot, his body is natural.

name: Humungousaur
description: Humungousaur is a somewhat humanoid dinosaur standing about twelve feet tall with hard brown skin and incredible strength.

name: Jetray
description: Jetray is a red, humanoid manta ray-like alien with a yellow patagia that he uses to fly and glide through water at supersonic speeds.

name: Big Chill
description: Big Chill is a humanoid, moth-like alien, whose four wings and two antennae-like wing folds can fold up into a poncho-esque robe with a hood, giving him the appearance of a phantom.

name: Chromastone
description: Chromastone is a silicon-based alien made of extremely durable crystal which enables him to absorb various forms of energy and channel it into powerful ultraviolet beams.

name: Brainstorm
description: Brainstorm has a light orange crab-like appearance with pincers for hands. He can open his skull plates at will to reveal his huge, corrugated brain, enabling his electrical powers. He is said to have an IQ of about one nonillion (10^30).

name: Spidermonkey
description: Spidermonkey is a small monkey-like alien with four arms and blue fur. He has the ability to expel webbing using a silk as strong as steel cable from his tail.

name: Goop
description: Being a 200-pound single-celled organism that is neither liquid nor solid but a colloidal suspension, Goop is a humanoid pile of goo that can take any shape at will. Goop has an Anti-Gravity Projector that allows him mobility in Earth's gravity, flight, voice projection. His brain is spread throughout his body.

name: Alien X
description: Alien X is a humanoid alien whose body has the appearance of a starry night sky. He is able to warp reality, time, and space with ease and at any level he wishes. Even his thoughts can become real. In short, Alien X can do anything, as long as his three personalities (Serena, the "voice of love and compassion"; Bellicus, the "voice of rage and aggression"; and Ben, the "voice of reason") agree.

name: Nanomech
description: Nanomech is about a centimeter tall at full size. His body is a carbon or silicon-based alloy that can be reduced in size at will, even to microscopic scales.

name: Lodestar
description: Lodestar has a magnetically floating metal head surrounded by a glowing white aura. He has crab-like claws for hands (similar to Brainstorm's) and his body is made of living alien metal.

name: Rath
description: Rath resembles an orange bipedal tiger with retractable claws that come out of his wrists. His natural strength increases whenever he gets angry.

name: Water Hazard
description: Water Hazard is a red, mollusk-like alien that can manipulate different sources of water. Through the portholes on his body, he can launch pressurized blasts of water.

name: Ampfibian
description: Ampfibian is a blue jellyfish-like alien with three-segmented skirt-like parts for his head, chest, and abdomen. He can manipulate and produce electricity that is able to stun or paralyze.

name: Armodrillo
description: Armodrillo is a yellow ten-foot-tall alien with an armored, robotic-like body. He has jackhammer arms and can transform his hands into drills. Despite his mechanical appearance, all of these aspects are, in fact, biological and natural to his race.

name: Terraspin
description: Terraspin is a green, turtle-like alien with large flipper-like arms, and stumpy legs. The tips of his arms also have three holes each, which can extend finger-like claws to use as fingers.

name: NRG
description: NRG is a humanoid alien, a physical being constantly emitting pure, red, radioactive energy. He wears a heavy, dark green-teal oven-like containment suit, with three slits capable of letting out some of his radioactive energy.

name: Fasttrack
description: Fasttrack is a blue feline-like alien with enhanced speed and agility. Despite his enhanced speed, he is still physically slower than Kinecelerans.

name: Chamalien
description: Chamalien has a slim body that resembles a large purple salamander with darker purple camo-esque spots all over. He is capable of blending in with the color of his surroundings with such effectiveness that he appears invisible

name: Eatle
description: Eatle is a ten-foot-tall robotic humanoid alien. He has a long horn on the top of his head and the ability to eat just about anything.

name: Clockwork
description: Clockwork is a robot-like alien with skin that is made of golden metal, with a transparent piece of green glass on his chest, revealing the gears inside of him.

name: Shocksquatch
description: Shocksquatch has the appearance of a thick, muscular yeti-like alien. He has metallic bolts on his hands and lower jaw capable of releasing strong electrical charges.

name: Juryrigg
description: Juryrigg is a red gremlin-like alien with a devil-like tail. He is small in stature, only about as big as a human head, and has a strong desire to break and remake machines, making him difficult to control.

name: Feedback
description: Feedback is a humanoid alien with two antennae and a tail with round plugs on their tips. He can absorb and redirect energy attacks, most commonly electricity.

name: Bloxx
description: Being an organosillicon-based life form with segmented hardened quasi-organic polymer skin, Bloxx's body is made up of individual red, blue, and yellow building blocks that he can rearrange at will.

name: Gravattack
description: Being a silicon-based lifeform, Gravattack is literally a living planet. He is a large, bulky, reddish-brown alien with rocky skin and a molten lava planet core at the center of his body.

name: Crashhopper
description: Crashhopper greatly resembles a mix between a grasshopper and a praying mantis with significantly large three-jointed hind limbs. He has relatively long and muscular legs which enable him to jump extremely long distances.

name: Ball Weevil
description: Ball Weevil is a small, yellow insect-like alien that can spit explosive, matter-absorbing sticky balls of plasma.

name: Walkatrout
description: Walkatrout is a small, blue fish-like alien with a shark-like dorsal fin, and a pair of thin, spindly legs jutting from his underside. He has a slippery body, making him hard to grab.

name: Pesky Dust
description: Pesky Dust is a short, fairy-like alien with blue skin. He has purple fairy-like wings making him capable of flight.

name: Mole-Stache
description: Mole-Stache is a rodentoid alien with a big blonde mustache and beaver-like teeth. His mustache is free-forming and able stretch itself into a variety of shapes

name: The Worst
description: The Worst is a yellow, fat, round blob-like alien. He has elephant-like feet and bear-like hands. He also has wart-like bumps on his forehead and both arms.

name: Kickin Hawk
description: Kickin Hawk resembles a combination of a rooster and a hawk. He is said to be one of the best close-range fighters, fighting almost exclusively with his legs.

name: Toepick
description: Toepick is an ogre-like alien with a metal cage helmet on his head. Inside his helmet is his terrifying face, which taps into the primordial fears locked within the viewer's subconscious, inducing a sense of fear and disgust.

name: Astrodactyl
description: Astrodactyl resembles a cross between a Pterodactyl and a glider. He has retractable wings that are connected to a jetpack-like structure on his back.

name: Bullfrag
description: Bullfrag is a humanoid frog-like alien with powerful jumping abilities and a long prehensile tongue, much like normal frogs.

name: Atomix
description: Atomix has a humanoid robotic appearance. His body is full of energy, giving him the ability to create and manipulate atomic or nuclear energy. Fundamentally, he is a walking nuclear reactor.

name: Gutrot
description: Gutrot has the appearance of a mechanical humanoid. His stomach is full of various gases that, through the nozzles located all over his body, can be ejected.

name: Whampire
description: Whampire is a vampire-like alien with pale skin and sharp yellow teeth. He has flaps under his arms, similar to the wings of a bat, that enable him to fly though the air at high speeds.
